10_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6.body:
My guess is to avoid expertsexchange problem.

I'd totally get the printable ASCII-only requirement (because of Unicode homoglyphs, invisible characters etc), but just /a-z0-9/ looks overly restrictive. An minus-dash, underscore or a dot (just one of those) shouldn't be an issue.
